Package Project

Class TableController

java.lang.Object
Project.TableController
public class TableController extends Object
Table controller class that manages the retrieval and updating of table.
Author:
Xun Yi

    • loadTable

      public static ArrayList<Table> loadTable()
      Load Tables from text file. Will initialize here if file cannot be found
      Returns:
      List of table of the restaurant

    • saveTable

      public static void saveTable()
      Save tables to text file for future uses.

    • addTable

      public static void addTable​(int seats)
      Add new table to restaurant
      Parameters:
      seats - - seat of the new table

    • getTable

      public static Table getTable​(int tableID)
      Get a table in the restaurant
      Parameters:
      tableID - - table ID to find a table in the restaurant
      Returns:
      table - Table of the table ID

    • removeTable

      public static void removeTable​(int tableID)
      remove a table to restaurant
      Parameters:
      tableID - - table ID to remove a table in the restaurant

    • showAvailableTables

      public static ArrayList<Table> showAvailableTables​(int pax)
      Find and show the list of available tables currently
      Parameters:
      pax - - filter the list to exclude tables whose seats are lesser
      Returns:
      list of available tables currently

    • getAvailableTableForResrv

      public static ArrayList<Table> getAvailableTableForResrv​(Calendar resDateTime, int pax)
      Find list of tables that are available for a reservation date and time. Exclude those that have reservation close to the timing given
      Parameters:
      resDateTime - - date and time of the reservation
      pax - - no of customer for the reservation
      Returns:
      list of tables that meets the reservation timing and seats

    • markOccupied

      public static void markOccupied​(int TableID, int orderId)
      Change the table availability to false
      Parameters:
      TableID - - ID of table that will be used
      orderId - - ID of the order for the table

    • markUnoccupied

      public static void markUnoccupied​(int TableID)
      Free the table
      Parameters:
      TableID - - ID of table being occupied

    • getMaxTablePaxNo

      public static int getMaxTablePaxNo()
      Find maximum seat size of a table
      Returns:
      maximum table seat size of the restaurant
